Title: Boris Johnson leaves No 10 - his departure speech in full - BBC News
Info: outgoing prime minister boris johnson has given his farewell speech outside no 10 downing street. mr johnson said his government "got brexit done" and rolled out covid-19 vaccines faster than many other countries. he also pledged to support his successor liz truss "every step of the way". © 2022 bbc. the bbc is not responsible for the content of external sites. read about our approach to external linking.
